page.title: 08CHALFONT AREA SCHOOL WORK
page.content: A typical school year. At the first school we work on different topics during the year, the first topic we did was on Harvest.Our next one was entitled {Transport}, we went to the London {Transport} {Museum} and had a nice time there.In the New Year we looked at Birds, we had 18 eggs but only 4 hatched.We like doing topics because we go on outings and make models.It is more interesting to see and do things than just sit in the classroom. In the Middle School we do individual as well as subject topics. Our timetable is quite formal we do Maths and English most mornings.We have regular assemblies.We cover all subject areas but sometimes change teachers.We have 4 houses and are awarded team points for good work etc.We also lose them sometimes.
